space.arim.api.platform.bungee

Class BungeeMessages

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.platform.AbstractPlatformMessages<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[]>
      • space.arim.api.platform.bungee.BungeeMessages
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormattingManipulator, PlatformFormattingParser<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[]>, PlatformMessageConverter<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[]>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpigotMessages

    public class BungeeMessages
extends AbstractPlatformMessages<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[]>
    BungeeCord messages utility. Use get() to get the instance.
    Enables compatibility with the BungeeCord/Spigot Chat Component API (CCA).
    Contains mirror methods for converting between respective API classes.

    Use get() to retrieve the instance for usage.

    net.md_5.bungee.api.ChatColor vs org.bukkit.ChatColor
    The Bukkit class org.bukkit.ChatColor is a legacy class retained for backwards compatibility. Since net.md_5.bungee.api.ChatColor is included in Spigot and BungeeCord, plugins should use it instead. Plugins may use colour.asBungee() for conversion, where colour is an instance of org.bukkit.ChatColor.
    BungeeCord/Spigot Chat Component API: Comparison with ArimAPI

    Colours and Styles
    Each API explicitly define chat colours and style formatting. However, ArimAPI distinguishes clearly between a Colour and Style, both of which are subclasses of Format.
    The CCA makes no such distinction; all of its colours and formatting are contained in ChatColor.

    Json Messages
    ArimAPI enables tooltips, urls, commands, suggestions, and insertions. The CCA has equivalent support for each of these. The CCA includes additional HoverEvent.Action options: HoverEvent.Action.SHOW_ACHIEVEMENT, SHOW_ENTITY, and SHOW_ITEM. For hover actions, ArimAPI only supports displaying tooltip messages. The tooltip, of course, may use colours and styles. Thus, there is ONLY an equivalent for HoverEvent.Action.SHOW_TEXT, but none other of the HoverEvent.Action values.
    The CCA includes additional ClickEvent.Action options: ClickEvent.Action.CHANGE_PAGE and OPEN_FILE. For click actions, ArimAPI only supports urls, commands, and suggestions. Thus, there are no equivalents for ClickEvent.Action.CHANGE_PAGE and OPEN_FILE.
    Author:
    A248

      • uncoloured

        public net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] uncoloured(String msg)
        Description copied from interface: PlatformFormattingParser
        Forms a message directly, without explicitly parsing formatting codes.
        Note that, if colour remains in the input string, clients may still see colours.

        This method does not remove colour from a message! Use FormattingManipulator.stripFormatting(String) or FormattingManipulator.stripFormatting(String, FormattingCodePattern) instead.
        Parameters:
        msg - the source message
        Returns:
        a direct result

      • parseJson

        public net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] parseJson(String msg,
                                                          FormattingCodePattern formattingPattern)
        Description copied from interface: PlatformFormattingParser
        Parses Json messages based on RezzedUp's json.sk format.

        The following json tags are parsed: ttp, url, cmd, sgt, and ins.
        Colours are parsed according to the specified formatting code char.
        Parameters:
        msg - the source message
        formattingPattern - the pattern corresponding to the formatting code char
        Returns:
        a json formatted result

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a json formatted result
